mapper.select: SELECT category_id AS id, name AS name FROM category

SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, c.name AS categoryName, b.title, b.writer, b.views, b.created_date AS generationTimestamp, b.modified_date AS modificationTimestamp, count(f.board_id) AS fileCounts FROM board b LEFT JOIN category c ON c.category_id = b.category_id LEFT JOIN file f ON f.board_id = b.board_id
GROUP BY b.board_id, c.category_id, b.title, b.writer, b.views, b.created_date, b.modified_date ORDER BY b.board_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT c.name AS categoryName, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.views, b.created_date AS generationTimestamp, b.modified_date AS modificationTimestamp FROM board b LEFT JOIN category c ON c.category_id = b.category_id WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (category_id, writer, title, password, content, created_date, views) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{encryptedPassword}, #{content}, #{generationTimestamp}, 0)
